https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/cQwczLZvwI04rZcFYBgg6OZAQBy.jpg Turbulent comedy about two Palestinian brothers who smuggle the dead body of their father from Jerusalem to Ramallah with the Israeli Police, a bunch of terrorists and the Russian Mafia breathing down their necks. 45 Minutes to Ramallah
